"Dino": "Hey. Have you gotten used to how Central City works?"
"This is our favorite spot. Good drink, nice scenery... Yeah, this is the life."
"*sigh*... I know what item I want, but it's a real pain to try and get a hold of..."
"I sure hope I'll be able to find one in somebody's My Shop..."
"Speaking of which, have you visited the My Shop yet?"
"It's a really useful service, so why don't I teach you about it?"
"My Shop is the virtual marketplace that ARKS use to buy and sell items among each other."
"Why don't you go take a peek and see what neat stuff is being sold by your fellow ARKS?"
"No worries. Let me know if you change your mind."
"Well, I leave the rest to you. Who knows, you might find a bargain!"
"Have you been to the My Shop lately? You should make a point of visiting it regularly."
"The listings update in real time, so who knows when you might stumble upon a great deal!"
